title: The American revolution
brief_description: Portrays highlights of the American Revolution from the Boston Tea Party to the surrender of Cornwallis to Washington at Yorktown. Includes scenes depicting the battles of Lexington and Concord, the attack on Fort Ticonderoga and the campaigns led by General Washington. No other credits available.
